name: Magic Nerd
description:
Franky is a normal teenager, he has been chosen and teleported in a magical world... He is the chosen one. His goal is to come back in his world and beat the monsters that have been perverted the Horned God.

Use your magic wand in the real life to create some spells in the game !

How to play ?

Alternatively you can use your keyboard arrows to navigate the spell wheel.
